title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Technology-Based Instructional Orchestration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education curriculum design experience and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design multi-level learning activities using a technology-based instructional framework
Learners can develop instructional strategies utilizing simulation/VR tools in a constrained technology environment (smartphone-centric)
Learners can acquire methods to measure the effectiveness of technology-based instruction in real-time using formative assessment tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
